page.description: Computes statistics for the field bound to the fully_qualified_object_name.

argument.name: fully_qualified_object_name
argument.description: The address of a child object on a form or browse.

page.discussion: The COMPUTE_FIELD_STATISTICS() function returns a dot variable, with all of the relevant statistics (e.g. count, minimum, maximum, total, average, etc.) for the field that is bound to the Fully_Qualified_Object_Name. For example:
page.example: objname= ":test_form:BROWSE1:item_total" stats = compute_field_statistics(objname) ?stats = Average = 106.659000 count = 10.000000 First = 35.910000 Last = 0.000000 Maximum = 235.520000 Minimum = 0.000000 Standard = 79.411404 Total = 1066.590000 Variance = 6306.171069
